articles.description: After a long hiatus, the Stanley Cup could run through Alberta again this year.
articles.content:
Matthew Tkachuk of the Calgary Flames chases the puck against Cody Ceci of the Edmonton Oilers during Game 1 of the teams second-round playoff matchup.Derek Leung / Getty Images

articles.author: Ava Ladner
articles.title: The All-Star Race Is Not The Problem - Frontstretch.com
articles.description: The NASCAR All-Star Race has faced criticism for a number of years but it is time to re-think the event beyond just reconfiguring the race segments.
articles.content: This weekend, the Cup Series returns to Texas Motor Speedway for the All-Star Race.  I havent checked, and nor will I bother, to see how many articles are being written about how the race is a waste … [+5958 chars]
